**Create a repository**

curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:9000/repositories \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'X-Auth-Token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..hjeuZFMeqGAGq98ltOAnFTj3wtvrYYgGbmX6m840dNk' \
  --data '{
	"name": "Repo 1",
	"uri": "http://a.com:9000",
	"type": {
		"key": "repo type1"
	},
    "attributes": {
        "weight": {
            "clazz": "DoubleValue",
            "value": 2.2,
            "unit": "kg"
        }
    }
}'

**Get a repository by key**

curl --request GET \
  --url http://localhost:9000/repositories/REPO1 \
  --header 'X-Auth-Token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..hjeuZFMeqGAGq98ltOAnFTj3wtvrYYgGbmX6m840dNk'

**Get a repository by uri**

curl --request GET \
  --url 'http://localhost:9000/repositories?uri=http://a.com:9000' \
  --header 'X-Auth-Token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..hjeuZFMeqGAGq98ltOAnFTj3wtvrYYgGbmX6m840dNk'

**Get a repository by type**

curl --request GET \
  --url 'http://localhost:9000/repositories?type=repo%20type1' \
  --header 'X-Auth-Token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..hjeuZFMeqGAGq98ltOAnFTj3wtvrYYgGbmX6m840dNk'

**Get a repository by uri and type**

curl --request GET \
  --url 'http://localhost:9000/repositories?uri=http://a.com:9000&type=repo%20type1' \
  --header 'X-Auth-Token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..hjeuZFMeqGAGq98ltOAnFTj3wtvrYYgGbmX6m840dNk'

**Delete a repository**

curl --request DELETE \
  --url http://localhost:9000/repositories/REPO2 \
  --header 'X-Auth-Token: eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..ro3tUONmAbXbAu15aX_IhoqivPItiiN7JchHy_hP7_g'
